page.title: 14WOKINGHAM - HEALTH
page.content: {The healh services}for Wokingham are provided by the west Berkshire Health Authority based at Great Western House, Station Road, Reading. Wokingham has its own{hospital}which provides a service for elderly patients only with a maternity unit as well.{Accident and emergency services} are provided at the Royal Berkshire Hospital, Heatherwood Hospital and Wexham Park Hospital. In total there are sixteen doctors practising at seven locations within Wokingham. Ten dental surgeons are based in four surgeries whilst there are three opticians. Wokingham also has two chemists. The family doctor, dental, opthalmic and pharmacy services are administered by the Family Practitioner Committee. The St Johns Ambulance provides voluntary help.
